column5: I'd like to try something closer to home than Lac Seul in 2010. Any suggestions for a resort in Ontario within 6 hours of Sault Ste. Marie border crossing ? I"m looking for someplace with housekeeping cabins and I'll be bringing my boat and a few friends. Thanks
Very good place to go and I think would be within your requirements, much smaller than Lac Seul but very good fishinghttp://www.osullivansrainbow.com/
Thanks for the suggestion however O'Sullivans is still over 800 miles from my home in Southwestern Onatrio
